replies.msg:
Dear President Wei Shyy,

You don’t know who I am, but that doesn’t matter, at least that never really mattered to you anyway.

When our students were doused with milk tea, it didn’t matter to you. When our students were beaten, that didn’t matter to you either. When our students wanted to meet and talk with you, you just simply didn’t care.

This begs the question Mr. President, what is HKUST to you? And do the students here matter to you at all?

HKUST students are the peaceful type right from the start, so peaceful that we joke that we are like pigs. So what do you have to fear, from peaceful pigs? What do you have to fear so much, that you have to increase security on campus, to install so many cctv cameras?

One of our students was severely injured yesterday, was expressing a note of concern and heading back to your cushy office all you could do? Did his severe injuries not matter to you at all? Are you waiting for something, like for some of us to die?

Mr. President, as the head of our school, not only did you lack the courage to lead and teach our students in what is right and wrong, but in the midst of critical and consequential events you are in hiding and absent. You didn’t protect, or even help our students. You abandoned us.

Remember, it is you, who abandoned us.

Don’t expect us to love this school anymore, no matter what academic achievements are gained, no matter what rankings are attained in Asia or worldwide, you have lost our hearts forever. Sorry, but there is no 1-HKUST for us anymore.

Remember, it is you, who abandoned us.

Regards,
A student who can no longer love HKUST
